newsitem.title: GERMANY: German Santa in bank nearly gets arrested.
newsitem.headline: German Santa in bank nearly gets arrested.

text.p: A Santa Claus distributing presents to workers in a German bank on Friday nearly ended up behind bars when a passing police patrol thought he was a robber in disguise.
The man, doing his rounds in the northern city of Hanover on the day when German children traditionally receive small presents from Saint Nicholas, convinced police eventually that he was genuine.
